resources.string: Shows delivery tracking updates from Aftership (up to 3 concurrent tracking items)
This Target requires the Aftership app
Show package image (if available) on supported Smartspaces
Show package location map (if available).\nNote: Location data is estimated from carrier information and may not be accurate.
Reset dismissed packages, re-showing those which are not delivered if they were previously dismissed
Periodically (every hour) refresh the tracking data for this package, even if Aftership\'s widget has not updated. May use more battery.
Set whether to show product images, location maps and reset dismissed packages
